note: Gruff queer, trans menace man, anarchist, university student, white Jew. I boost mutual aid posts so don't bitch about that. Very much not a tech person, very much a literature person. Still waiting for the utopia Star Trek promised.

name: profile pic alt text
value: Zagreus from Hades smiling pleasanty in front of a bisexual flag coloured background. His left hand is reaching forward, inviting. Big white text says "Let's take ibuprofen together" over the picture

name: header alt text
value: Grainy white letters in front of a ringed planet, saying: "The universe has existed for billions of years and by chance we ended up living at the same time. That counts for something."
